text: @realDonaldTrump A lie? I think that is your middle name! Your entire presidency has been ONE HUGE LIE!! ALL OF IT!! We all can't wait until we can boot u out of office! U r the most pathetic person on the face of this Earth! All of the people that have died from covid-19 is ALL ON U!! 🤬🤬
